meanings.definition: A book containing a collection of songs.
meanings.sent1: I love flipping through my songbooks to find new tunes to sing.
meanings.sent2: She kept her favorite songbooks neatly stacked on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The songbooks on the table seemed to be whispering melodies to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a songbook, each note a page waiting to be sung.
meanings.sent5: The colorful covers of the songbooks brightened up the room like a musical rainbow.

meanings.sent1: The songbooks at the party had everyone dancing and singing along.
meanings.sent2: His extensive songbooks included classics from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The songbooks in his mind played a never-ending concert of memories.
meanings.sent4: The songbooks of nature filled the air with the sweet melodies of birds.
meanings.sent5: The songbooks of the past echoed through the halls, bringing back nostalgic feelings.
